reproduction.translation[0].definitions[: the act or process of producing babies, young animals, or plants
Scientists studied the reproduction, diet, and health of the dolphins.
the act of producing a copy of a book, picture, piece of music etc
Unauthorized reproduction of this publication is strictly forbidden.
a copy of a work of art, piece of furniture etc
a reproduction of Vincent Van Gogh’s ‘Sunflowers’
reproduction.translation[1].definitions[: the work of copying documents, books etc or preparing them for printing
Bulk reproduction is performed by high-speed photocopiers.
